The LCLC and language Oasis are normally open from 9am to 5pm during the Spring and Fall semesters. See the schedule below for more details about our current hours. Morgan St.,  Grant Hall 3013,  MC 042,  Chicago,  Illinois  60607    Email: lclc@uic.edu  Website: https://lclc.uic.edu/             Contact           General Inquiries    Equipment Reservation    Oasis Reservation             Reserve the Language Oasis  If you would like to schedule a special event in our Language Oasis please click here and let us know how we can help.      Equipment Reservation  The LCLC has a wide variety of equipment for language instructors and TAs. Click here to reserve equipment for your classroom or event.      Peer Tutoring Contact Information  Click here if you have questions about our Peer Tutoring in French, German, Spanish, or Italian.      School of Literatures, Cultural Studies and Linguistics  The School of Literatures, Cultural Studies and Linguistics (LCSL) is home to six independent departments, three academic programs, and the Sandi Port Errant Language and Culture Learning Center.
